name: Death Dice Dance
description:
I'm sorry for the experience I've presented you with here. I have no idea how I managed to make a character whose controls feel like coding in an esoteric language.

Controls:

W,A,S,D -> move

space or enter -> end turn

left/right arrows-> adjust camera

Made in GODOT in 48 hours for the GMTK2022 jam. Sounds made with bfxr.
